import React, { useState } from 'react'; import logo from '../images/logo.svg' export default function Form() { const [getQR, setgetQR] = useState({ data: '', size: '', color: '', bgcolor: '', format: '', }) const getValues = (e) => { const {name, value} = e.target; setgetQR((prev)=>{ return {...prev, [name]: value} }) } const formSubmit = () => { //console.log(getQR) //console.log(getQR.data) const {data, size, color, bgcolor, format} = getQR const qrAPI = `https://api.qrserver.com/v1/create-qr-code/?data=${data}&size=${size}&color=${color.slice(1,color.length)}&bgcolor=${bgcolor.slice(1,bgcolor.length)}&margin=1&qzone=1&format=${format}` document.querySelector('.qrcode').src = qrAPI; console.log(qrAPI) } return (
